item.title: Ref Counted Objects and C++ Smart Pointers
item.author: sharat_masetty@yahoo.com (Sharat Masetty)
item.description: In this article we will look into implementing a simple smart pointer class with reference counting support for tracking the lifetime of a pointer. First we will try to understand the primary models of memory management in most modern programming languages.

item.title: About me
item.author: sharat_masetty@yahoo.com (Sharat Masetty)
